name: Chuck
description: Cut from the shoulder; tough but flavorful.

name: Shank
description: Cut from the leg; very tough and chewy.

name: Brisket
description: Cut from the breast; tough if not cooked properly.

name: Rib
description: Cut from the rib area; very tender and flavorful.

name: Short plate
description: Cut from the belly of the cow; chewy and quite tough.

name: Flank
description: Cut from the abdominal muscles of the cow; one of the toughest cuts.

name: Lion
description: Cut from the back of the cow above the ribs; one of the tenderest cuts.

name: Sirloin
description: Cut from the back of the cow just past the loin; pretty tender and flavorful.
